objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Historical lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about daily routines and habits using informal register
Students create original historical themed content about daily routines and habits in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Historical story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using informal register in historical context
Character B: Responding in informal register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with tradition
daily routines and habits with heritage
daily routines and habits with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
